name: Monochromatic Escape Room
description:
Link to play game in  broswer: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1Y2rvyfmyqPNDrl7B33_RokwaX11tJuKmsyhX43q2...

A digital escape room using only google slides. Features ciphers, counting, riddles, keypads, and colors.

The grey room was created for Global Game Jam 2020.

The full puzzle was created for Puzzle Jam February 2020, which asked for a minimum of 16 puzzles. The Monochromatic Escape Room has 4 rooms, each that requires you to figure the 4 numbers for the keypad.
